response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its value to you stands at $800,000, and we aim to make this transaction beneficial for both parties. After careful consideration, we propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between the intrinsic value of the product and our valuation, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. We believe this price reflects the quality, uniqueness, and potential benefits the product offers to you. Should you require any further information or have concerns about this proposal, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
